attributes.action: let big al (al davies) be a contestant in the big brother house after all the efforts he as put in over the years to get there. i.e. going to every audition up and down the country by what ever means possible to get there,and not predudice against him!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
the petition is about the public voting me (big al) into the house as its not like x-factor or anyshow like this were you need a talent. also the public vote people out of this show so why not they vote who goes in!not because of looks age or sexuality.
i have been trying to get into this show since the start hitching, sleeping rough to get to these auditions, entertaining the auditionees in the process, it has takin over my life!i have even changed my appearance this year now i look like frank from shameless, will this work!!

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
